course_name: Intellectual Property - Issues in Science & Technology
description: This course explores a range of issues arising from the application of the law of intellectual property to scientific and technical innovations. The course will look at the way that intellectual property law interacts with a range of different frontier technologies.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
